todo-tasks.title: Create Login Component
todo-tasks.description: Create a Fully Functional Login System, that can fetch credentials and responses for the Backend Login API. Therefore Warranting the creation of a Robust Backed Login API.

todo-tasks.title: Create A Registration Sub_system
todo-tasks.description: Create A Fully Functional and Manageable Registration System. It should be able to post data to backend and fetch backend response seamlessly, and update the User Context.

subList.title: Handle and Manage Exceptions and Errors

todo-tasks.title: Create A  Dashboard / Home Page
todo-tasks.description: Create A Landing Page for Users. It should be able to make use of the user context info to fetch user specified information from the database. It should also have logic that renders content based on user type

subList.title: Create A Brief History Child Component
Create Navigation System ( Tab, Stack, Drawer )

todo-tasks.title: Create Product Components ( Farmer & Buyer )
todo-tasks.description:
Create Products Components That allow: 
1. The Farmer To Create Product listing to show Buyers. 
2. The Buyers To Browse Through Product Listing & Act on them.
The Components Should Communicate With Backend And Fetch Data.

subList.title: Create A Product Listings Creation Component (farmer)
Create A Product Listings Browsing Component (farmer)
Backend API to Fetch Product Info( both )

todo-tasks.title: Create The Contract Management Compomnent
todo-tasks.description: Create A Fully Functional Contract management system, that allow creation, updating and termination of contracts between two parties.

todo-tasks.title: Create A Messaging Component
todo-tasks.description: Create A Messaging System, that allows the sending of both custom and push messages. It should also allow pop-up and push notification if a message is recieved

todo-tasks.title: Create History Component
todo-tasks.description: Create A History Page That Shows All The Recorded Activities of the User. The History Includes activities like contracts made, deals and transactions made

todo-tasks.title: Security Measures and Implementation
todo-tasks.description: Identify security threats and build counter measurers, to avoid unauthorized access and confirm eligibility.

todo-tasks.title: Create The Harvest-Hub Database
todo-tasks.description: Create The Database That Will Be Deployed To The Server and The Local Database. They Will Users To Access Data both while they are online and offline

todo-tasks.title: HarvestHub Testing
todo-tasks.description: Perform almost all kinds testing of functional and non-functional requirements

subList.title: Handle and Fix Login &// Register Error and Problems

todo-tasks.title: Testing Todo API
todo-tasks.description: Test If There any Problems Associated with the todo api logic and requests.
